verbs.description: as [ARG0: temperatures] [V: hits] [ARG1: 92 new york teachers union ponders heat days] we 've all heard of snow days when there too much snow to get to school or it just too cold to keep the buildings warm now the state major teachers union is suggesting we have heat days when it too hot to stay in class at least if the rooms are n't air conditioned albany national weather service karen corona assemblyman jim skoufis kelly defeciani niskayuna new york state center for school health new york state united teachers joe cebulko dizziness
